list_definition.definition: energetic or lively; able to work etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: At seventy, he’s no longer very active.
She is an active supporter of women’s rights.
Yeast is an active ingredient in bread-making.

list_definition.definition: of the form of a verb in which the subject performs the action

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The verb ‘kicked’ is active in the sentence ‘The boy kicked the ball’.

list_definition.definition: the form of a verb whose subject is the person or thing that performs the action
